description_top: Collection of biblical commentaries and other materials
catalogue_description: Hebrew and Judaica Manuscripts at the Bodleian Libraries, Oxford University
title: Collection of biblical commentaries and other materials
author: Levi ben Gershom
description: Contents: Naḥmanides, Commentary on the Pentateuch (ff. 2r-8v). Italian translation of Ketuvim (passages of Job) (ff. 9r-18v). David Kimhi, Commentary on Psalms (ff. 19r-98v). Naḥmanides, Short commentary on the Pentateuch (ff. 100r-164v). Menahem ben Benjamin Recanati, Sefer Reʾayat ha-Yadayim me-eḥad me-ḥakhmei Hodu (ff. 165r-166v). Fragment (f. 167). Levi ben Gershom, Commentary on Job (ff. 170v-235v). Ṭoviyahu ben Eliʻezer, Midrash leḳaḥ ṭov (le-ḥamesh megilot) (ff. 236r-302(i)r). Astrological fragment (ff. 305r-306v). Sefer Goralot (ff. 307r-314v).
